Author: pashle
Content: I agree, jamongkad! The best part about them, and a major reason why I submitted their post, is that they're from Sydney, Australia. I wanted to show all you non-US entrepreneurs that you don't have to startup in the US to be successful. These guys, and many others in the Aussie startup community, provide much inspiration to Aussie students like myself who hope to follow them into the industry. I hope they add some value and inspire you too!
